definitions.definition: One of a team of horses which is nearest to the wheels of a carriage , as opposed to a leader or forward horse.
A person who labors heavily for a particular cause , without being concerned about recognition .
A foot - propelled vehicle ; a bicycle .

main_definition: ( US , dated ) One of a team of horses which is nearest to the wheels of a carriage , as opposed to a leader or forward horse.
secondary_definitions: ( US , figuratively ) A person who labors heavily for a particular cause , without being concerned about recognition .
( obsolete or historical ) A foot - propelled vehicle ; a bicycle .
